alert.note: Alert for Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 20 at 3:58AM MST until February 22 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations 6 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. In Montana, Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 6 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Recreation in the high country will be impacted by heavy accumulating snow. Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall is expected tonight. Expect wind chills below zero by Monday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
